page.title: 03RELIGION
page.content: The first Minister was Rev.David Simpson and today the Minister is Rev.Hepburn.The Church is over 200 years old. It was opened for public worship on 25th March,1781.The present parish Church was erected in 1780 as a "Chapel of ease." It's a small Church, every Sunday there is a Sunday School. (There is going to be a new Church Hall.)There is a organ in it with 300 pipes.There is a balkany too. There are about 259 graves in the grave yard.There are 16 elders in {BRACO } Church. The duties of a Church elder are:assist the {Minister}with parish duties,to serve communion, to welcome people at the {Church} door, and to serve on {Church}committiees.One of the longest serving elder is local farmer{Jim Dawson }who has been an elder for 22 years.{Ministers}were pressing hard to have the sacrement
